title: The Spoiled
text:
The Spoiled is an Italian music project founded in 2015 by Giovanni Santolla in Sammichele di Bari. Its music combines post-punk, dark wave and industrial.


== History ==
Initially started as a studio project, The Spoiled released its debut EP Ironshell on January 13, 2016  and a video for the single Wish House. Their full length Parasite  came out on June 22, 2016 via Manic Depression Records.
After going on hiatus for 8 years, The Spoiled came back in late spring 2024 with the self-released singles Love Is Pain, I Don't Wanna Be Me (Type O Negative cover), Time, Hole In A Chest and the two-songs EP Dancing On My Grave.
In August 2024, the band set up a 2-piece line up with Santolla on vocals, guitars and synths and Daniele Raguso from A Copy For Collapse on synths, and started performing live shows.
On October 4, 2024, Manic Depression Records released the compilation EP Time, including all the singles released by The Spoiled in 2024 and the videoclip of the track Hole In A Chest. 
In November 2024, The Spoiled releases a re-arranged and remastered version of its first EP, "Ironshell", anticipated by an updated version of the video of "Wish House".


== Official Members ==
Giovanni Santolla - vocals, guitars, bass, bass vi, synth, programming, percussions (2015–2016, 2024–present)


== Additional Live Lineup ==
Daniele Raguso - keyboards, synth (2024–present)
